author: Staff Reporter
text: The city police on Monday arrested a 60-year-old man on a charge of sexually assaulting two five-year-old children here on Sunday. The police said that Babulal of Kitchipalayam was living alone. On Sunday evening, he lured the two children by giving chocolates and committed the crime. The children left his home crying. Based on a compliant, Kitchipalayam police registered a case against Babulal under The POCSO Act, 2012, and arrested him. – Staff Reporter
title: 60-year-old held for sexually abusing children
